Title: A Comprehensive Guide to Common Azure Services: Best Practices and Key Considerations
Description: In this article, we'll explore some of the most widely used Azure Services. You'll learn about their ideal use cases, which services complement them best, and what to watch out for. Additionally, we'll delve into important aspects such as backups, scalability, availability, and monitoring to help you make informed decisions when using these services. This article will be updated in the long run with new services, as demand and time allows.
